text: P. seemannii may refer to a few different species of plant. The specific epithet seemannii refers to someone with the surname 'Seemann,' in many cases it's botanist Berthold Carl Seemann (1825–1871). * Passiflora seemannii, a species of passionflower in the genus Passiflora * Phyllanthus seemannii, a plant in the genus Phyllanthus native to Fiji * Phytelephas seemannii, the Panama ivory palm * Ptychosperma seemannii, a synonym for Balaka seemannii, a palm endemic to Fiji
title: P. seemannii
